Eva Longoria welcomed her first child — a boy named Santiago Enrique — with husband José Bastón in Los Angeles on Tuesday, June 19, her rep confirms to Us Weekly. “ We are so grateful for this beautiful blessing, ” the couple said in a statement to Hola! USA, in addition to sharing the first photo of their newborn with Us and the magazine. Us confirmed in December that the Desperate Housewives alum was expecting. While this is her first child, it ’ s Bastón ’ s fourth. He shares three kids — son José and daughters Tali and Mariana — with ex - wife Natalia Esperón. The Telenovela actress chatted with Us Weekly in February where she dished on finding out she was pregnant while directing Fox ’ s comedy The Mick
